comments.body: Maybe `Unregister()`? Or is `Remove()` a common or previous name for this operation?

> Maybe Unregister()? Or is Remove() a common or previous name for this operation?

I think, there were no any equivalent methods before.
Here conceptual problem - there is no direct equivalent with RCanvas::Register(), while any created canvas automatically inserted into global list. But without Rmove() call canvas cannot be regularly destroyed.
